dataType.name: Force
dataType.description: A force is a push or pull upon an object resulting from the object's interaction with another object.

dataType.name: Decimal
dataType.description: A number that uses a decimal point followed by digits that show a value smaller than one.

measurementUnit.name: Newton
measurementUnit.description: The newton (symbol: N) is the International System of Units (SI) derived unit of force.

relationshipType.name: base
relationshipType.sourceToDestination: A Catalogue Element can be based on multiple Catalogue Elements of the same type. Value domains will first use rules of the base value domains and then their own when validating input values.
relationshipType.destinationToSource: A Catalogue Element can be base for multiple Catalogue Elements of the same type.
